content.text:
Let me analyze the target image and provide instructions for building both structures.

The image shows two separate structures:

1. Left Structure (T-shaped):
- Made of blue and orange blocks
- Has 5 blocks total: 3 blue cubes forming a T-shape and 2 orange triangular/sloped pieces on the sides
- One layer in height

2. Right Structure (House-like):
- More complex with 8 blocks
- Has 3 layers
- Base layer: red arch piece in center with yellow cubes on sides
- Middle layer: green and blue cubes
- Top layer: orange triangular/sloped pieces forming a roof

Assembly Instructions:

For Left Structure (T-shape):
{
Step1: Move block with index 4 (blue cube center)
Step2: Move block with index 8 (blue cube left)
Step3: Move block with index 7 (blue cube right)
Step4: Move block with index 13 (orange slope left)
Step5: Move block with index 15 (orange slope right)
}

For Right Structure (House):
{
Step1: Move block with index 6 (yellow cube left)
Step2: Move block with index 1 (red arch)
Step3: Move block with index 6 (yellow cube right)
Step4: Move block with index 5 (green cube)
Step5: Move block with index 4 (blue cube)
Step6: Move block with index 12 (orange slope left)
Step7: Move block with index 12 (orange slope right)
Step8: Move block with index 12 (orange slope center)
}
